title: Border, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: satin, stem and chain stitch embroidery on plain weave foundation
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Skirt border of natural-colored linen, embroidered in blue, green, yellow, red, cream and white silks.  Design of stylized flowers in pots, mermaids, and birds. Needle lace edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: satin, stem and chain stitch embroidery on plain weave foundation. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-23.
